channel.title: How to change drop rates on Allstarscape v2
channel.description:
[code]npcdrop = 1 1 6529 3 6529 4 6529 5 6529 6 6529[/code]
Am i supposed to change anything here? hich is my npcdrops.cfg or is supposed to be somewhere else? If so what am I supposed to edit?

item.title: How to change drop rates on Allstarscape v2
item.dc:creator: @lemons_burn lemons burn
item.description:
@lemons_burn wrote:

well here ya go

go to cpsdrops.config

here a drop from chaos ele

npcdrop = 3200 537 10 100

the first 1 is the npc number
the 2nd 1 is the item ID
3rd 1 is how many
4th 1 is the percent

hope it helped

Read full topic
item.source: How to change drop rates on Allstarscape v2
